question: Can Flotillin be used as exosomal marker?
ideal_answer:
Yes,
Flotillin 1 is a known exosomal marker protein.

snippets.text: Flotillin 1 and tumor susceptibility gene 101 (TSG101), two exosomal marker proteins,
expressed exosomal marker tumor susceptibility gene (TSG) 101 and flotillin (Flot) 1.
